Others: The article discusses the goalless draw between India and Mauritius in the Intercontinental Cup 2024, Manolo Marquez's first match as India's head coach.
The article mentions that Manolo Marquez praised the centre-back pairing of Chinglensana Singh and Rahul Bheke for keeping a clean sheet against Mauritius.
The article highlights that Manolo Marquez termed the match as a 'boring game' as India created no chances throughout the 90 minutes.
